Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/89th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/89th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/89th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
